{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1980 |Team=Tulane Green Wave |Image= |ImageSize=150 |Conference= |Division= |ShortConference= |CoachRank=Not ranked |APRank=Not ranked |Record=7-5 |ConfRecord=1-1 |HeadCoach=Vince Gibson |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |StadiumArena=[[Louisiana Superdome]] |Champion= |BowlTourney=All-American Bowl |BowlTourneyResult= Loss, 15-34 vs. [[Arkansas Razorbacks football|Arkansas]] }} The '''1980 Tulane Green Wave football team''' represented [[Tulane University]] in the 1980 college football season. The Green Wave competed in the All American Bowl but lost. The offense scored 279 points while the defense allowed 243 points. Two members of the Green Wave team were drafted into the National Football League. Vince Gibson was in his first season as head coach.
==Regular season== *In the [[Battle for the Rag]], Tulane lost to [[LSU Tigers football|LSU]] by a score of 24-7. ===Schedule=== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#063003;color:#CCEEFF;" | '''Game''' || '''Date''' || '''Opponent''' || '''Result''' || '''Green Wave points''' || '''Opponents''' || '''Record''' |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 1 || Sept. 6 || Southern Mississippi || Loss || 14 || 17 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 2 || Sept. 13||@ Stanford || Loss || 14 || 19 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 3 || Sept. 20 || Rice || Win || 35 || 14 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 4 || Sept. 27 ||@ Mississippi || Win || 26 || 24 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 5 || Oct. 4 || Southern Methodist || Loss || 21 || 31 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 6 || Oct. 11 ||@ Vanderbilt || Win || 43 || 21 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 7 || Oct. 18 || Air Force || Win || 28 || 7 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 8 || Oct. 25 ||@ Georgia Tech || Win || 31 || 14 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 9 || Nov. 1 || Kentucky || Win || 24 || 22 || |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 10 || Nov. 15 || Memphis || Win || 21 || 16 ||7-3 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 11 || Nov. 22 || @ Louisiana State || Loss || 7 || 24 || 7-4 |- align="center" bgcolor="" |}<ref> http://cfreference.net/cfr/school.s?id=342&season=1980 </ref>
